title: Lining Numerals in HTF Didot?
content:
Hello  
Is there a way to get lining numerals in Hoeffler's Didot? I think I have the entire family but can't seem to find lining numerals.  
Thanks for any insight...
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content:
Hi Rob,

[nope, it seems there are no lining numerals](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023123938/http:/www.typography.com/testDriver/index.php?mode=characters&productLineID=100004).  
F

Not a perfect option at all, but you could always use a didone that does have them such as [Linotype Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023123938/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/linotype_didot_virtual/).
